sentences: Ogbugbu na ntọ na ịgba ụlọ ọkụ abụrụla njirimara ndị ekperima n'obodo Cabo Delgado na mpaghara ugwu Mozambique.
Amabeghi ihe mere otu a akpọrọ 'Sons of Mociambo' ji akpa mkpa mkpa a.
Lee ihe nnyocha Africa Eye chọpụtara maka ha.
